abstract: Congregation of Emanuel African Methodist Episcopal Church in South Carolina holds funeral for Myra Thompson, its last memorial service for victims of massacre that is being described by authorities as assault rooted in racism; suspect Dylann Roof has been arrested and charged with nine counts of murder.
lead_paragraph: The historic Emanuel African Methodist Episcopal Church held its last funeral Monday for one of the nine victims of what authorities have described as an assault rooted in racism.

headline.main: Charleston Church Mourns One More Beloved Victim
headline.print_headline: Church Mourns One More Beloved Victim

snippet: The historic Emanuel African Methodist Episcopal Church held its last funeral Monday for one of the nine victims of what authorities have described as an assault rooted in racism.
